title: Rapper Khalifa cited for taking a "Whiz" in Pittsburgh
text:
Published By: CBS News: Entertainment - Today 
A city spokeswoman says Wiz Khalifa was caught engaging in public urination behind a bar at around 2:30 a.m. Saturday...
